text: Wetaꞌm uwach jun achi ri kꞌo pa Cristo chi kajlajuj junabꞌ xkꞌam bꞌik kꞌa churox kaj, we kꞌu pa ri utyoꞌjal o man pa ri utyoꞌjal ta neꞌ, man wetaꞌm taj, xaq xwi ri Dios etaꞌmaninaq.12:2 Ri Pablo tajin kutzijoj ribꞌ chi riꞌ, wine are tajin kutzijoj rij ri qꞌotaj are xbꞌan che abꞌaj kumal ri winaq aꞌj Listra, are waꞌ ri qꞌotaj are je xtzijon we riꞌ.
